Category.label: Category
Category.description: Defines the schema metadata for categories managed by StructureSync.

Display label.label: Display label
Display label.description: Human-readable label used for display instead of the internal name.

Has description.label: Has description
Has description.description: Description text explaining the purpose of the category, property, or subobject.

Has target namespace.label: Has target namespace
Has target namespace.description: Target namespace where pages of this category are created (e.g., Main, User).

Has parent category.label: Has parent category
Has parent category.description: Parent categories for inheritance in the category hierarchy.

Has required property.label: Has required property
Has required property.description: Properties that must be filled in for pages of this category or subobject.

Has optional property.label: Has optional property
Has optional property.description: Properties that may optionally be filled in for pages of this category or subobject.

Has required subobject.label: Has required subobject
Has required subobject.description: Subobjects that must be present on pages in this category.

Has optional subobject.label: Has optional subobject
Has optional subobject.description: Subobjects that may be present on pages in this category.

Has display format.label: Has display format
Has display format.description: Controls how properties are rendered in the display template.

Has display header property.label: Has display header property
Has display header property.description: Properties to display prominently in the header of the page.

Has display section name.label: Has display section name
Has display section name.description: Name of a display section used in inline subobjects.

Has display section property.label: Has display section property
Has display section property.description: Properties included in a given display section.

Allows value.label: Allows value
Allows value.description: Enumerated allowed value for a property.

Allows multiple values.label: Allows multiple values
Allows multiple values.description: Whether the property itself can have multiple values.

Has domain and range.label: Has domain and range
Has domain and range.description: For page-type properties, restricts values to pages in a given category.

Subproperty of.label: Subproperty of
Subproperty of.description: Marks this property as a subproperty of another property.

Allows value from category.label: Allows value from category
Allows value from category.description: For autocomplete, restricts value suggestions to a given category.

Allows value from namespace.label: Allows value from namespace
Allows value from namespace.description: For autocomplete, restricts value suggestions to a given namespace.

Has display template.label: Has display template
Has display template.description: Custom HTML/wikitext template for rendering a property value.

Has display type.label: Has display type
Has display type.description: Built-in display type for rendering property values.

Has display pattern.label: Has display pattern
Has display pattern.description: References another property whose display template should be reused.

Has subobject type.label: Has subobject type
Has subobject type.description: Identifies which Subobject schema a stored subobject instance conforms to.
